English:
You came. And much earlier than I expected.
You are indeed an excellent client.
Chinese:
來了嗎……比我預想的還要早很多。
果然是優秀的委託人。
Korean:
왔나… 예상했던 것보다 꽤 빨리 왔군
역시 우수한 의뢰인인 모양이다
German:
Du bist hier. Und zwar viel früher, als ich
dachte. Wirklich eine hervorragende Klientin.

English:
Please, take a seat on the sofa. The investigation
has concluded. I can offer you my report.
Chinese:
請到沙發上坐。
調查已經結束了，我來報告結果吧！
Korean:
자, 소파에 앉아 주세요
조사는 끝났습니다, 결과를 보고하도록 하죠
German:
Bitte setz dich doch aufs Sofa. Die Untersuchung
ist beendet. Ich habe einen Bericht für dich.

English: ...and here are the results of the investigation.
Chinese: 以上就是這次的調查結果。
German: Hier also die Ergebnisse unserer Nachforschungen.

English:
A hacker team known as Zaxon was involved in the
account raid.
Chinese: 帳號狩獵是跟一個叫做Zaxon的駭客集團有關。
Korean:
계정 사냥에는, 잭슨이라는 해커 팀이
관련되어 있었습니다
German:
Ein Hackerteam namens „Zaxon“ war am
Kontenraub beteiligt.

English:
Makoto Yamashina is not missing at all.
He's living a normal life.
Happily, with his daughter Chika and his wife.
Chinese:
山科誠沒有失蹤，好端端地，
過著普通的生活。
跟他的“女兒”千夏和太太，三人和睦地住在一起。
Korean:
야마시나 마코토는 행방불명도 그 무엇도 아닌
평범한 생활을 보내고 있었습니다
"딸"인 치카와 부인까지 세 명이서, 화목하게 말이죠
German:
Makoto Yamashina wird gar nicht vermisst.
Er lebt ganz normal sein Leben, froh und munter
mit seiner Frau und seiner Tochter Chika.

English:
I'd like to bring this investigation to a close,
if you don't mind.
Chinese:
那麼這次的調查，
可以算是結束了嗎？
German:
Ich würde diesen Fall gerne schließen, wenn’s
recht ist.

English: No, there's no problem. Thank you very much.
Chinese: 好的……沒有問題……謝謝你們。
German: Okay, kein Problem. Vielen herzlichen Dank.

English:
Um, isn't there a problem, though?
Who exactly are you?
Excellent! Case closed!
Chinese:
我覺得應該有問題吧……？
妳到底是“誰”？
太好了，委託案結束了。
Korean:
아직 문제가 있지 않나요…?
당신은 대체 "누구"인가요?
다행이다, 의뢰 완료네요
German:
Äh, gibt es nicht doch ein Problem?
Wer bist du eigentlich genau?
Prima! Fall gelöst!

English:
You're welcome at any time.
Next time, feel free to use your real name.
Chinese:
歡迎隨時過來。
下次請務必使用本名。
Korean:
언제든 환영합니다
다음엔 부디, 본명으로 와 주십시오
German:
Du kannst jederzeit wiederkommen.
Gern auch unter deinem echten Namen.
